thread.title: China Airlines Awards CheapOair Five Million Dollar Sales Award
thread.title_full: China Airlines Awards CheapOair Five Million Dollar Sales Award

author: PRWEB
title: China Airlines Awards CheapOair Five Million Dollar Sales Award
text:
“This award symbolizes the new heights CheapOair and China Airlines will reach together,” said Richard Mei, China Airlines’ District Sales Manager, Eastern Region USA. “China Airlines salutes CheapOair’s continued support and outstanding contribution." New York, NY
CheapOair, a leading hybrid travel agency, announced today that it received the 5 Million Dollars Sales Award from China Airlines, Taiwan’s largest airline and one of the leading airline carriers in Asia.
“We are thrilled about this award,” says Sanjay Hathiramani, senior vice president of supplier relations at Fareportal, the company that operates CheapOair. “We have had an excellent partnership with China Airlines for years and this award recognizes our effort to provide our customers an effortless, affordable and enjoyable booking experience.”
The 5 Million Dollar Sales Award, presented to CheapOair on June 16, 2015, recognizes the company for achieving ticket sales of five million dollars or more and its overall achievement as a global leader in travel.
Awarded at the China Airlines regional office in New York City, this award touts CheapOair’s sales achievements and recognizes the company’s success in coordinating and booking travel on behalf of customers on and offline.
“This award symbolizes the new heights CheapOair and China Airlines will reach together,” said Richard Mei, China Airlines’ District Sales Manager, Eastern Region USA. “China Airlines salutes CheapOair’s continued support and outstanding contribution, and we look forward to reaching new milestones together in the future.”
About China Airlines
China Airlines is Taiwan’s national carrier. China Airlines’ network includes 34 destinations in China, 14 destinations in Southeast Asia, 17 destinations in Northeast Asia, and the North American gateways are: Vancouver, Los Angeles, San Francisco, New York, Honolulu, with the brand new 777-300ER fleet service offered from LAX, SFO and JFK. China Airlines’ premium business class has just won the Red Dot Awards’ Best of Best.
About CheapOair
CheapOair is the first hybrid (online/traditional) travel agency that enables consumers to book travel online, on mobile apps, by phone or live chat. CheapOair ( http://www.cheapoair.com , 1-800-566-2345) bridges the gap between an online and traditional travel agency with certified travel agents available 24/7 to help find deals and offers to destinations worldwide on over 450 airlines, 150,000 hotels, and 100s of car rentals. Partner airlines benefit from access to CheapOair's broad customer base that books high yield international travel and add-on ancillaries at above the industry average. Follow CheapOair on Facebook and Twitter to learn how to travel the world for less.
